# style

**Instance Property**

The display style for the action button.

## Declaration

```swift
var style: CPAlertAction.Style { get }
```

## Discussion

The combination of [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPAlertAction/style-swift.property] and the template type, [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPActionSheetTemplate] or [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPAlertTemplate], determines the appearance of the action button.

## Getting the Action Style

- **CPAlertAction.Style**: Display styles for an alert’s action button.
